items.name: Mental Herb
items.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder shakes off move-binding effects to move freely. It can be used only once.

items.name: Rocky Helmet
items.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder is hit, the attacker will also be damaged upon contact.

items.name: Sitrus Berry
items.effect: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, it can restore its own HP by a small amount during battle.

items.name: Eject Button
items.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder is hit by an attack, it will be switched out of battle.

abilities.name: Effect Spore
abilities.description: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

items.name: Assault Vest
items.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This offensive vest raises Sp. Def but prevents the use of status moves.

items.name: Weakness Policy
items.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Attack and Sp. Atk sharply increase if the holder is hit with a move it's weak to.

items.name: Lum Berry
items.effect: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, it can recover from any status condition during battle.

items.name: Leftovers
items.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder's HP is slowly but steadily restored throughout every battle.

items.effect: If held by a Pokémon, it restores the user's HP in a pinch, but it will cause confusion if the user hates the taste.

items.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts moves used consecutively but only until a different move is used.

items.name: Power Lens
items.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder's Sp. Atk stat to grow more after battling.

items.name: Aguav Berry
items.effect: If held by a Pokémon, it restores the user's HP in a pinch, but it will cause confusion if the user hates the taste.

abilities.name: Strong Jaw
abilities.description: Boosts the power of biting moves.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

items.name: Life Orb
items.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the power of moves but at the cost of some HP on each hit.

items.name: Choice Specs
items.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These curious glasses boost Sp. Atk but only allow the use of one move.

items.name: Scope Lens
items.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a lens for scoping out weak points. It boosts the holder's critical-hit ratio.

items.name: Assault Vest
items.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This offensive vest raises Sp. Def but prevents the use of status moves.

items.name: Lum Berry
items.effect: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, it can recover from any status condition during battle.

items.name: Weakness Policy
items.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Attack and Sp. Atk sharply increase if the holder is hit with a move it's weak to.

items.name: Mystic Water
items.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This teardrop-shaped gem boosts the power of Water-type moves.

items.name: Choice Scarf
items.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This curious scarf boosts Speed but only allows the use of one move.

items.name: Expert Belt
items.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a well-worn belt that slightly boosts the power of supereffective moves.

items.name: Roseli Berry
items.effect: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will lessen the damage taken from one supereffective Fairy-type attack.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.description: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.description: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.
